title: Anyone play Warframe? Is it worth getting into?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/jGOFvTX.jpg[/img]

Tried it years ago and didn't think much of it but I have seen a lot of positive news popping up for it recently. It seems to have a pretty loyal fanbase, I heard it was really obtuse and hard to get into though kind of like Eve. 

I am trying to hedge my bets, I want to have a looter/grinder game to fall back on and I am afraid Destiny 2 isn't going to cut it. I already preordered it but I haven't seen a single positive thing said about it so far so now I'm getting scared I wasted my money. Should I just wait and see if it gets better or give Warframe a shot? Can you get a lot out of it without spending money? I'm pretty broke atm so I won't have any cash to throw at it for a while.
